creditline: Gift of Dr. Patricia L. Hutinger
description: galloping horse with flat, stylized rider (wearing long headdress); flat, stylized figure beneath front legs of horse; incised decoration on both figures (front only); on wooden base (attached)

title: All Of You Get Out Of My Way! (Hanta Po!)
